Text: JUST GREEEAAAT DOWNLOAD IT  SEED IT AND SHARE IT!!!!
THANKS mkvonly for this international gem. You will make my children (and thus me) very happy! :))

I downloaded this and the English audio tracks in the hopes of being able to play it on my BluRay player.  I muxed them together using mkvmerge and everything fine.  Windows Media Player played the movie fine as well, but my bluray player says its unrecognizable.  While this is clearly a problem on MY end, I was wondering if perhaps somebody knows of another torrent elsewhere where somebody has had success in watching on their bluray.  I should also note that i can watch other .mkv files on my bluray player just fine.  I think it's because this is in 1080p though.
Thank you very much for your time and effort to share this with us.
